rooms.description: spacious entrance hall leading to living areas and reception area.
open concept living area with contemporary design elements and abundant natural light.
cozy dining space adjacent to the kitchen, aligning with Vastu principles by placing it in the south-eastern part of the floor plan.
modern kitchen equipped with contemporary fittings and optimized workflow; positioned in alignment with Vastu guidelines.
quiet study and reading area situated near a window for natural light, fostering calmness and learning.
guest washroom conveniently located near the dining area.
